title: Floating Sky Temple Adventure #40
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Temple Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A magnificent entrance hall carved from white marble that seems to glow with inner light. Through arched windows, you see clouds drifting past at eye level - the temple truly floats among the peaks. Wind chimes sing softly in the breeze. Ancient pillars support a vaulted ceiling painted with celestial maps. Prayer flags flutter near the doorways.

items.name: stone pedestal
items.description: A marble pedestal with an offering bowl and carved inscriptions

items.name: bronze key
items.description: A key engraved with cloud patterns and wind symbols

items.name: prayer cabinet
items.description: A wooden cabinet with three compartments for sacred items

items.name: temple history scroll
items.description: An ancient scroll describing the temple's origins
items.text: The Floating Sky Temple was built in the year 888 by the wind monks of the Sky Peaks. Master Zephyr, the first Guardian, channeled the power of wind to lift the temple into the clouds. Here, seekers come to find enlightenment above the mortal world.

items.name: silver key
items.description: A polished silver key with feather engravings

items.name: offering bowl
items.description: A bronze bowl containing incense and small tokens

items.name: wind token
items.description: A small jade token carved with swirling wind patterns

items.name: locked shrine
items.description: A small shrine with a bronze lock, dedicated to the temple's founder

items.name: Guardian's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal belonging to Master Zephyr
items.text: I, Master Zephyr, have dedicated my life to maintaining this sacred temple. The Hall of Winds contains our most precious teachings. Only those who understand the temple's nature may enter the Sky Sanctuary - they must know where we dwell, what element we command, and who guards this place.

items.name: celestial ceiling map
items.description: A painted map on the ceiling showing stars and mountain peaks
items.text: The map depicts the Sky Peaks mountain range with the temple floating above the highest summit. Constellations of the wind spirits are painted around it.

items.name: carved wooden door
items.description: A door carved with images of clouds and flying birds, leading to the Hall of Winds

rooms.name: Hall of Winds
rooms.description: A breathtaking hall where wind flows freely through open archways on all sides. Silk banners ripple and dance in the constant breeze. The floor is polished stone inlaid with patterns of swirling air currents. Meditation cushions are arranged in circles. Through the archways, you see nothing but sky and distant clouds. A magnificent door to the east leads to the Sky Sanctuary.

items.name: altar of winds
items.description: A stone altar where wind seems to spiral upward in a visible column of air
items.text: Inscription: 'Here the sacred wind rises eternal. Master Zephyr taught that wind is the breath of the heavens, the element that lifts us above earthly concerns. In the Sky Peaks, we float between earth and sky.'

items.name: circle of meditation cushions
items.description: Cushions arranged for group meditation practice

items.name: scroll of teachings
items.description: A scroll containing the temple's core teachings
items.text: The Three Truths of the Sky Temple: First - We dwell in the Sky Peaks, above the world. Second - We command the element of wind, which gives us freedom. Third - Master Zephyr guards this sacred place as the eternal Guardian.

items.name: flowing silk banners
items.description: Long banners of blue and white silk that dance in the wind
items.text: The banners are inscribed with prayers: 'May the winds carry us to enlightenment. May Master Zephyr guide our path. May the Sky Peaks shelter us always.'

items.name: stone bookcase
items.description: A carved bookcase holding sacred texts about wind meditation

items.name: wind meditation manual
items.description: A manual teaching wind meditation techniques
items.text: To master wind meditation, one must understand that wind is our sacred element. It flows through the Sky Peaks and lifts our temple. Master Zephyr achieved perfect harmony with wind, becoming the Guardian of this floating sanctuary.

items.name: offering table
items.description: A low table with incense and small statues

items.name: note about the sanctuary
items.description: A handwritten note from a senior monk
items.text: Reminder to novices: The Sky Sanctuary is the holiest place in our temple. To enter, you must prove your understanding by answering the three sacred questions. Know where we are, what we command, and who protects us.

items.name: sanctuary door
items.description: An ornate door carved with images of Master Zephyr and wind spirits. Three questions are inscribed on a jade plaque beside it.

password_questions.question: Where does the temple dwell?
password_questions.hint: Check the temple history scroll and the altar inscription

password_questions.question: What is the sacred element?
password_questions.hint: The scroll of teachings and meditation texts mention this

password_questions.question: Who is the Guardian?
password_questions.hint: Multiple texts throughout the temple name the Guardian

rooms.name: Sky Sanctuary
rooms.description: You have reached the Sky Sanctuary! The holiest chamber of the floating temple opens before you. The room has no walls - only pillars supporting a golden dome. You stand on a platform of white marble suspended in the open sky. Clouds drift past on all sides. A gentle wind swirls around you, and you feel weightless. At the center, a glowing portal of swirling air offers passage to safety below.

items.name: golden dome
items.description: A magnificent dome that seems to capture and reflect sunlight

items.name: portal of winds
items.description: A swirling vortex of gentle wind that glows with ethereal light
items.text: The portal hums with power. You sense it will carry you safely down from the floating temple to the world below.

items.name: sacred marble platform
items.description: The platform where monks achieve the highest level of enlightenment

items.name: statue of Master Zephyr
items.description: A serene statue of the temple's founder, his robes seeming to billow in an eternal breeze

rooms.win_message: You have reached the Sky Sanctuary and proven yourself worthy! The wind portal activates, and gentle currents of air lift you up. You float through the swirling vortex, and it carries you safely down from the floating temple to the mountain below. As you descend through the clouds, you look back to see the magnificent Sky Temple gleaming in the sunlight above. You have solved its mysteries and escaped. You win!
